snippet: The Mets rode Dillon Gee’s strong start to a 4-2 lead, but in a scenario that has played out all too often this season, their relief corps proved incapable of holding the lead.
abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks defeat New York Mets, 5-4.
lead_paragraph: The Mets rode Dillon Gee’s strong start to a 4-2 lead, but in a scenario that has played out all too often this season, their relief corps proved incapable of holding the lead.

headline.seo: Bullpen Falters as Mets Lose to Diamondbacks
headline.main: Solid Start, Some Timely Hits, Then the Bullpen Was Called
headline.print_headline: Solid Start, Some Timely Hits, Then the Bullpen Was Called
